typography.bodyStyle: Medium sans-serif, white, ~18-20px, centered, moderate line-height

components.notable: Primary CTA (Get Started) is orange/red, secondary is text link with arrow

components.notable: Shows institutional adoption and major integrations

Seamless integration of partnership badge mid-hero

Routes to login page for existing users

typography.headingStyle: No explicit heading in cookie banner

components.description: Right-side overlay panel with semi-transparent background
components.notable: Positioned to minimize blocking of primary content while maintaining visibility

components.description: X icon button in top-right corner of modal
components.notable: Allows dismissal without accepting all cookies

components.description: Three toggle switches for different cookie categories
Hyperlinks for Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy, Storage Preferences
components.notable: Blue color distinguishes from body text

components.description: Three buttons: Save, Accept All, Reject Non-Essential
components.notable: Primary (Accept All) and secondary (Save) in orange, tertiary (Reject) in orange outline

design.visualHierarchy: Disclosure text → links → toggles → action buttons (bottom-heavy emphasis on consent actions)
innovativeElements: Three-button footer with clear gradation of consent intensity

flow.userIntent: Make informed consent decision regarding cookies and tracking technologies

interactiveElements.action: Accepts all cookies and closes modal
Rejects optional cookies, keeps essential only
Dismisses modal, likely infers essential-only consent

flow.informationArchitecture: Disclosure → Policy links → Fine-grained controls → Action hierarchy
frictionPoints: Modal positioned to side but still partially obscures hero content
Multiple disclosure paragraphs may require scrolling within modal
Three button options may create decision paralysis (Accept All vs Save vs Reject)

microcopy.text: This website utilizes technologies such as cookies to enable essential site functionality, as well as for analytics, personalization, and marketing. You may change your settings at any time or accept the default settings. You may close this banner to continue with only essential cookies.
microcopy.context: Main body text of cookie modal
microcopy.purpose: Discloses cookie usage and user rights per GDPR/privacy regulations
Directs users to detailed cookie documentation
Directs users to general privacy disclosures
Allows granular control of data storage and tracking

trustSignals: Clear option to reject non-essential tracking
